name: architecture
description: Visualize and document pplx-sdk system architecture with Mermaid diagrams — layer maps, data flow, dependency graphs, sequence diagrams.

diagram_type.description: Type of diagram (layer-map, data-flow, sequence, dependency-graph, class-hierarchy)

scope.description: What to diagram (e.g., 'full SDK', 'transport layer', 'SSE flow')

prompt: Generate a {{diagram_type}} Mermaid diagram for pplx-sdk. Scope: {{scope}}. Map the core → shared → transport → domain → client layered architecture. Show dependencies, data flow, and component relationships.
